name: Funky Furnishing
description:
Made for Watch + Jam 4: Buildings that don't look like buildings

Furnish your home according to local customs. Check the magazine to see samples of furnished rooms - there are 6 room styles to match. Activate the front door to open a menu of furniture items you can add to your house.

The web build may be a bit slow, and mouse capturing may not work perfectly. It may take a minute to fully load once you see the intro screen. If you're having problems, I recommend the download version.

WASD to Move
E to Activate/Pickup/Drop
Left Mouse Button to Throw
X to Delete a Held Item
Esc/Tab to open Menu
